svg.text: Event sequence (mermaid source included as fallback):

foreignObject.pre:
sequenceDiagram participant CLI participant Pipeline participant EventBus participant Subscriber
CLI->>Pipeline: migrate(files) Pipeline->>EventBus: publish(file.migrate.started) EventBus->>Subscriber: notify Pipeline->>EventBus: publish(step.completed) EventBus->>Subscriber: notify Pipeline->>EventBus: publish(file.migrate.completed) EventBus->>Subscriber: notify
